CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 13+8-1 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy) (Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life;Article 8-1 - Respect for home);Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8-1 - Respect for home)
